content:
According to the Academia's records, each bubble world has its own special plants.
Looks like chrysanthemums are the specialty here.
They're... quite practical actually, good for brewing tea and even cooking.

But strangely, all creatures seemed to avoid it.
How curious...
So I secretly picked one to keep as a specimen.

Oh, that's interesting.
What's the right water temperature for brewing chrysanthemum tea?

While wandering through other worlds,
I came across a very special plant,
it glowed with elegant colors.

Tea party...
The phrase brings to mind the rich aroma of black tea and sweet cakes.
Huh? Chrysanthemum tea?!
